summary: This bill proposes to rename the Department of Veterans Affairs medical center in Dallas, Texas, as the "Eddie Bernice Johnson VA Medical Center." The bill highlights Congresswoman Johnson's contributions to veterans' affairs, including her work as a psychiatric nurse and her legislative efforts to support veterans. It details her history in Congress and notes the specific legislation she championed related to veteran care. The bill then officially designates the medical center under the new name and specifies how it should be referenced in other official documents.
